Name: Chrono Project
About the game: The Chrono Project is a 2.5D side scroller game, with a focus on meaningful storytelling that mixes seamlessly with the gameplay. The game features platforming, puzzles and simple combat. Take on the role of the Chosen One, destined to end a century long conflict between the two great factions. Discover their history, their true nature and their future. Key Features: Simple 2D gameplay shifting and turning in a fully fleshed out 3D world, with custom made models and environments. A deep, well layed out story line, with loads of backstory to discover. Moral choices with meaningful and sensible consequences. The ability to undo events and rewind time, whenever desired, to any point of a play trough. Custom, professionally made sound effects and music. Published by WARdd development Independent development studio
